trans-unit.source: Represents the International Color Consortium (ICC) or Image Color Management (ICM) color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 表示与位图图像相关联的国际色彩联合会 (ICC) 或图像颜色管理 (ICM) 颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.
trans-unit.target: 支持的标准颜色空间是 sRGB、 ScRGB、 RGB、 CMYK、 灰色、 多通道和未知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取与位图图像关联的颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.
trans-unit.target: 标识所需颜色配置文件的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile located at a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用位于给定 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用任何不受支持的颜色配置文件，你必须安装一个，并使用其 URI 来初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> is derived.
trans-unit.target: 从其中派生 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用与提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> 最匹配的标准颜色配置文件（sRGB 或 RGB）初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: 标识要比较是否相等的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否等同于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the supplied <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 等同于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的此实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the hash code for the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示对象的哈希代码的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to determine equality.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的两个实例进行运算，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的实例相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> to determine that they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的两个实例进行运算，以确定它们是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的实例不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a readable <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: 返回原始颜色配置文件数据的可读 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A readable <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: 原始颜色配置文件数据的可读 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] 颜色配置文件的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。
